1{-# LANGUAGE FlexibleInstances #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Position on code string.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Base.IO.CodePos
7  ( -- * Code position
8    CodePos (..),
9    cpColumnNo,
10  
11    -- * Get code positions
12    GetCodePos (..),
13
14    -- * Codic
15    Codic (..),
16    codic, noCodic,
17  ) where
18
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture           as O
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Prelude       as B
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Text          as B
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.IO.IOPoint    as B
23
24
25-- ----------------------  CodePos
26
27-- | Position on input code string.
28data CodePos = CodePos
29      { cpSource     :: B.NIOPoint  -- ^ Source of code
30      , cpLineNo     :: Int         -- ^ Line number
31      , cpLineText   :: String      -- ^ Code string line
32      , cpText       :: String      -- ^ Current code string
33      } deriving (Eq)
34
35-- | Number of input point, line number, and column number,
36--   e.g., @\/1.6.14\/@.
37instance Show CodePos where
38    show = longSlash
39
40-- | Line number and column number, e.g., @\/6.14\/@.
41instance B.PPrint CodePos where
42    pprint = B.pprint . shortSlash
43
44-- showAngle :: CodePos -> String
45-- showAngle = showCp (\s l c -> "<I" ++ s ++ "-L" ++ l ++ "-C" ++ c ++ ">")
46
47longSlash :: CodePos -> String
48longSlash = showCp (\s l c -> "/" ++ s ++ "." ++ l ++ "." ++ c ++ "/")
49
50shortSlash :: CodePos -> String
51shortSlash = showCp (\_ l c -> "/" ++ l ++ "." ++ c ++ "/")
52
53showCp :: (String -> String -> String -> String) -> CodePos -> String
54showCp f cp = f s l c where
55    s = show $ B.nioNumber $ cpSource cp
56    l = show $ cpLineNo cp
57    c = show $ cpColumnNo cp
58
59instance Ord CodePos where
60    compare = cpCompare
61
62-- | Empty code position, i.e., empty content and zero line number.
63instance B.Default CodePos where
64    def = CodePos B.def 0 "" ""
65
66cpCompare :: CodePos -> CodePos -> Ordering
67cpCompare p1 p2 = line O.++ column where
68    line   = cpLineNo p1 `compare` cpLineNo p2
69    column = size p2 `compare` size p1
70    size   = length . cpText
71
72-- | Column number at which code starts.
73--
74--   >>> let cp = CodePos (B.nioFrom "abcdefg") 1 "abcdefg" "abc"
75--   >>> cp
76--   /0.1.4/
77--   >>> cpColumnNo cp
78--   4
79--
80cpColumnNo :: CodePos -> Int
81cpColumnNo CodePos { cpLineText = line, cpText = subline }
82    = length line - length subline
83
84
85-- ----------------------  GetCodePos
86
87-- | Type which has code positions.
88class GetCodePos a where
89    getCPs :: a -> [CodePos]
90
91    getCP :: a -> CodePos
92    getCP a = B.headNull B.def $ getCPs a
93
94instance GetCodePos CodePos where
95    getCPs cp  = [cp]
96    getCP  cp  =  cp
97
98instance (GetCodePos cp) => GetCodePos [cp] where
99    getCPs = concatMap getCPs
100
101
102-- ----------------------  Codic
103
104-- | Value with code string.
105data Codic a =
106    Codic { codicCPs :: [CodePos]    -- ^ Code positions.
107          , uncodic  :: a            -- ^ Value.
108          } deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
109
110instance Functor Codic where
111    fmap f (Codic cp a) = Codic cp $ f a
112
113instance GetCodePos (Codic a) where
114    getCPs = codicCPs
115
116-- | Create value with code position.
117codic :: (GetCodePos cp) => cp -> a -> Codic a
118codic cp = Codic $ getCPs cp
119
120-- | Create codic value without code string.
121noCodic :: a -> Codic a
122noCodic = Codic []
123
